CmdLine: echo "# Installing redis" ;  apt-get update -qq ;  apt-get install -qq -y software-properties-common ;  add-apt-repository -y ppa:rwky/redis ;  apt-get update -qq ;  apt-get -y install redis-server ;  echo "vm.overcommit_memory = 1" >> /etc/sysctl.conf ;    echo "# Clean up" ;  apt-get remove -qq -y software-properties-common ;  apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /setup /build
Commands.Name: run
